workflow.name: Onboard Switch from NetBox via PnP
workflow.title: Onboard Switch from NetBox via PnP

properties.name: Tenant Name
properties.description: NetBox tenant name to filter devices

properties.name: Device Status
properties.description: NetBox device status to filter (e.g., planned)

properties.name: Devices Array
properties.description: JSON array of devices from NetBox

properties.name: Current Site Path
properties.description: Full site path for Catalyst Center (Global/Tenant/Region/Site/Location)

properties.name: Current Template Name
properties.description: Day0 template name for current device

properties.name: Current Device ID
properties.description: NetBox device ID for status update

Onboards switches from NetBox to Catalyst Center via Plug and Play (PnP).

Based on Ansible playbook: 02_switch-onboarding.yml

Workflow:
1. Get planned devices from NetBox (filtered by tenant and status)
2. Get MGMT VLAN information
3. For each device:
   - Extract device info (serial, hostname, PID, site, template)
   - Get uplink interface info
   - Build site path (Global/Tenant/Region/Site/Location)
   - Calculate IP settings (IP, subnet mask, gateway)
   - Claim device via Catalyst Center PnP API
   - Poll for provisioning completion
   - Update NetBox device status to active

Prerequisites:
• Devices must exist in NetBox with status 'planned'
• Devices must have custom fields: ccc_pid, ccc_template_name, ccc_location, ccc_ip
• Interfaces must have label 'Uplink' for uplink detection
• MGMT VLAN must exist in NetBox
• Site hierarchy must exist in Catalyst Center
properties.display_name: Onboard Switch from NetBox via PnP

properties.description: Get Tenant ID based on Tenant Name
Get all devices with specified tenant and status

actions.name: Set Variables
actions.title: Store Devices Data and Initialize Counters

properties.display_name: Store Devices Data and Initialize Counters

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Build Site Path and Calculate IP Settings

properties.display_name: Build Site Path and Calculate IP Settings
properties.script:
import sys
import ipaddress

# Get inputs
tenant_name = sys.argv[1]
region_name = sys.argv[2]
site_name = sys.argv[3]
location = sys.argv[4] if len(sys.argv) > 4 and sys.argv[4] else ''
ip_cidr = sys.argv[5] if len(sys.argv) > 5 else ''

# Build site path: Global/Tenant/Region/Site[/Location]
site_path = f"Global/{tenant_name}/{region_name}/{site_name}"
if location:
    site_path = f"{site_path}/{location}"

# Calculate IP settings from CIDR
try:
    network = ipaddress.ip_interface(ip_cidr)
    ip_address = str(network.ip)
    subnet_mask = str(network.network.netmask)
    # Gateway is typically .1 of the network
    gateway = str(list(network.network.hosts())[0])
except Exception as e:
    ip_address = '0.0.0.0'
    subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0'
    gateway = '0.0.0.1'

print(f"Site Path: {site_path}")
print(f"IP: {ip_address}, Mask: {subnet_mask}, GW: {gateway}")
